scripts.storybook: <%= scriptRunCommand %> build:style && tsc && <%= scriptRunCommand %> analyze -- --exclude dist && concurrently -k -r "tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "<%= scriptRunCommand %> watch:style" "wds -c .storybook/server.mjs"
scripts.storybook:build: <%= scriptRunCommand %> build:style &&  tsc && <%= scriptRunCommand %> analyze -- --exclude dist && build-storybook
